评论详情: Sweet toile pattern but sheer and thin material, feeling cheap.
Beautiful dress
I got this thinking it would be cute, and it was. However, it was also way too small/tight. It was so form fitting that I returned it. It was not flattering at all.
Material is see-through
Very stylish and great price. Some people comments on the fabric being somewhat see through but I don’t think so.
Dress was cute for summer but the material is super see through and thin,  unfortunately I had to return. I ordered a medium and it was try to size, length was good
Cute dress and design. Ran too small for me to keep. It was also a bit see through.

The print on this dress was really cute! The fabric although was something very different than I was expecting. I was thinking this dress would be a more stiff material, whereas I felt this was more spandex and slim fitting.
The fabric of this dress is thin and cheap. The dress has no form of its own. Just a total waste of time and money.

I love this dress! I am 5'-0" tall and ordered the small in the blue pattern. It is the perfect length and so comfortable. The material is soft and feels good quality. I did have to iron it before wearing, but that was not an issue. I haven't washed it yet so I can't speak on that. Overall very happy with this purchase so far. And I feel it is a great value for the price! Definitely would recommend.
This dress is so amazing for the money! Looks more expensive than it is! Very flattering and got many compliments on it!
Very comfortable!!! Shrunk a little after washing it, but it's form fitting and very flattering. No bra needed

This is a beautiful dress!! Love the colors. However, important to know that it is somewhat see through, you can get away with it if you wear some beige or neutral underwear but if not you will see it. Also the material is very thin but I love it. You can wear it with the sleeves up or down. I also like that is not extremely tight on the bottom so it does flare out a little. I am 5’3 110lbs for reference.

评论概述: Cute but didn’t work for me
评论详情: Really cute dress, just too short for me. I’m 6’1 and it hit too high on my thighs. Couldn’t bend over without showing too much. Love the print though.
this does NOT look like a high end dress.  The fabric is cheap and the fit is very pre teen- no hips.
The print is adorable but it runs small and the material was a bit flimsy for the price.

This dress is so cute. I wish it had fit. Actually, it did fit, I just like things a little looser on me. The pattern is so pretty And the dress is well-made with nice fabric. I am 5'10" and weigh 172 and Ordered the extra large.

A influencer influenced me on Instagram and they looked so cute in this dress. The fit was a bit off for me and the quality was bad, it’s a super weird fabric. Almost more like an athletic fabric. I returned.
A little thin. Mini dress fits true to size This is cream and not white
Very cute dress
Item was not white it was blush and so thin. Very cheap material, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY

I saw this on tik tok and I thought I was going to love it. Unfortunately it is so thin and short that I couldn't wear it. You can see through it and I was really disappointed with the quality. I have seen so many advertisements for Cider brand items, especially on Instagram, but i definitely won't fall prey to them again. I wouldn't recommend this dress really.

This dress is so see through, you could see my nude color thong through it. Also you’ll need a special bra due to the square shape of the top. I was also sad to find out the color is more of a cream/light beige than white. For all these reasons, I returned the dress.  Would have given 2 stars because I’m sure this dress would look cute on someone, but I ordered a medium and a large to see which fit I liked better but they sent me two large. Smh.

评论概述: Love that Cider is on Amazon
评论详情: I’ve purchased directly on shopcider.com and I love that they are on Amazon. This brand fits my need perfectly and this dress was perfect for a birthday glamping trip. I wore it io dinner and it fit perfectly other than the straps being a little long but if you have a larger chest that shouldn’t be a problem. I’ve received lots of compliments when I wore the dress and I plan to take it on a trip in a few days.
The print is lovely but the fabric is so thin and cheap, does nothing for my figure and looks like it is from Amazon if you know what I mean
Dress arrived in undamaged shipping envelope and was sealed in a plastic bag, when I opened it the dress was soaking wet!
I really love this dress but the reason I didn’t put 5 stars is because of the quality of the fabric is so thin . Ordered size M and fits prefect
Fits perfect
This is the worst quality piece of material I’ve ever encountered. It looks cheap, feels terrible, and the fit is awful. Avoid!
Fits super nicely
